com.drs.gem.injector.core

Interface Container


  • public interface Container
    Interface represents Dependency Injection container. Container instance is used to declare new modules, initialize, inject dependencies into all modules declared via this container instance and obtaining fully initialized module instances.
    Author:
    Diarsid

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Container buildContainer()
      Method to get a new Container instance.
      static Container buildContainer(Declaration... declarations)
      Method to get a new Container instance.
      void declareModule(String moduleInterface, String moduleImplem, ModuleType type)
      Method to declare new module in container.
      <M extends Module>
      M      		 getModule(Class<M> moduleClass)
      Returns appropriate module instance that is fully initialized.
      void init()
      Start point of container work.
      void useRecursiveInjector()
      Force container to use RecursiveInjector for module instantiation instead of default LoopInjector.

    • Method Detail

      • declareModule

        void declareModule(String moduleInterface,
                   String moduleImplem,
                   ModuleType type)
        Method to declare new module in container.
        Parameters:
        moduleInterface - canonical name of declared module interface
        moduleImplem - canonical name of declared module implementation class
        type - module's type, SINGLETON or PROTOTYPE
        See Also:
        ModuleType

      • init

        void init()
        Start point of container work. Container Collects all information about modules and initialize all singleton modules that have been declared via this container instance.

      • useRecursiveInjector

        void useRecursiveInjector()
        Force container to use RecursiveInjector for module instantiation instead of default LoopInjector. See ModulesContainer for more usage details and Injector interface for explanation about difference between two injector types.

      • getModule

        <M extends Module> M getModule(Class<M> moduleClass)
        Returns appropriate module instance that is fully initialized.
        Type Parameters:
        M - actual module interface.
        Parameters:
        moduleClass - class object of actual module interface.
        Returns:
        fully initialized module.
        See Also:
        Module

      • buildContainer

        static Container buildContainer()
        Method to get a new Container instance. It is implied that modules will be explicitly declared later in container via .declareModule().
        Returns:
        new Container instance.

      • buildContainer

        static Container buildContainer(Declaration... declarations)
        Method to get a new Container instance. Accepts array of Declarations as info about declared modules.
        Parameters:
        declarations - array of module declarations.
        Returns:
        new Container instance.
        See Also:
        Declaration
